name: Zoo Fight
description:
Get control of a random character in the beginning of the round, you have 15 seconds to get most points. After the end of the round, you need to upgrade any class, but you will not know what class you will get in the next round. Try to get the highest score in the end of 3 rounds.

Keyboard Required to play.

Controls:
Arrow keys (or ADSW): Move 
Z: Attack
Q: Damage yourself

This was made by:

nzLulu - Art

Jujubito - Everything else
